txt.en: Goblin-town has long been a thorn in the side of the free peoples in Rhovanion. Once again, the goblin horde inside stirsâ€¦.\n\nYour mission is to destroy the watch-towers on the path to the Goblin-gate.
You have been tasked with destroying watch-towers outside the Goblin-gate.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'The goblins of the Misty Mountains have long plagued the people of Rhovanion. A great horde of them still resides inside Goblin-town. It is imperative that we KEEP them inside the mountains, and prevent them from adding their forces to Gorgar's army. My scouts have discovered that the goblins are re-building their watch-towers at the Goblin-gate. This is surely the first step to striking out into the wider world once more. You must destroy their watch-towers, and push the goblins back into Goblin-town!'
Complete Mission: Watch-towers at the Goblin-gate
Your mission is to destroy the watch-towers on the path to the Goblin-gate.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to the Goblin-gate.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
'Well done! I will ensure some of my scouts keep an eye on the Goblin-gate, and will let you know if your help is needed again. It will be, of course. Those goblins are never-ending....'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
